name: The SIX sided BOSS
description:
The SIX sided BOSS - Dice Boss Rush Game


This game was created in 48 for GMTK game jam 2022 with the theme Roll The Dice. You play as a dice trying to defeat number of bosses.

  • move with WASD / Arrow keys
  • visit red parts of playable space to jump through worlds
  • bar behind is your timer so think quick or get hit.
  • the big number on the playable space is the number you will have to combine to do the attack. 
  • combine numbers from top of the dice. Numbers on the sides are hints for your next move.
  • Example: For objective number 12 you can roll -> 4 + 5 + 3
  • If you roll the required sum you will do damage to the boss.
  • some tiles may fall so watch out!
  • if you are low on health you can pick up some health packs on your way
  • Have fun!
